Master Answer:
We do not have access to your daughter's immunization history here at ImmunizeBC. If you live in BC, your local public health unit will have a record of any immunizations your child received through public health. If your child was immunized at their doctor's office, you will need to contact the doctor's office to request your child's record.  You can find more information on locating immunization records here.
Immunization Nurse
Master Question: Hello, I am wondering if you might have access to my daughter's immunization history? I know that she is up to date, however, her health passport was not filled out each time.
